title: Club León (women)
text:
Club León Femenil is a Mexican women's <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="Le%C3%B3n%2C%20Guanajuato">León, Guanajuato</a>, Mexico. The club has been the female section of <a href="Club%20Le%C3%B3n%20">Club León </a> since 2017. The team currently plays in the <a href="Liga%20MX%20Femenil">Liga MX Femenil</a> which started in July 2017.
Players.
Current squad.
"As of 16 July 2021"
